Text.Value: Gateway PROFINET IO-Device to 16-Port Two-Track IO-Link Wireless Master (PDCT)
Supports FastStartup, Identification & Maintenance 1-3 and 5 (IOLD submodules), Shared Device, RT and IRT Communication down to 1ms Sendclock, Advanced startup.
PROFINET IO-Device to 16-Port Two-Track IO-Link Wireless Master gateway (PDCT). Minimum Device Interval is 1ms and supports Netload Class III.
IO-Link Wireless Master without configuration. Use a PDCT tool to adjust the master settings
IO-Link Wireless Master without configuration. Use a PDCT tool to adjust the master settings
IO-Link Wireless Device 32 I/ 32 O + PQI (PDCT)
IO-Link Wireless Device with 32 I/ 32 O + PQI. Use a PDCT tool to set up the IO-Link port configuration
IO-Link Wireless Device 16 I/ 16 O + PQI (PDCT)
IO-Link Wireless Device with 16 I/ 16 O + PQI. Use a PDCT tool to set up the IO-Link port configuration
